document.full_text: brandon dubinsky scored with less than two minutes to go as the new york rangers beat the washington capitals 3-2 on sunday to lift themselves back into the nhl's eastern conference quarter-finals.
document.title: rangers beat capitals to narrow playoff deficit
lines_and_colors: brandon dubinsky scored with less than two minutes to go as the new york rangers beat the washington capitals 3-2 on sunday to lift themselves back into the nhl's eastern conference quarter-finals.
